summary.para: Describes the space currently used by an acceleration structure..

remarks.para: The information in this structure is useful for tools to be able to determine how much memory is occupied by an arbitrary acceleration structure currently sitting in memory.

summary.para: Space currently used by an acceleration structure. If the acceleration structure hasn’t had a compaction operation performed on it, this size is the same one reported by , and if it has been compacted this size is the same reported for post-build info with .
